blueskyLogin.title: Connect to BlueSky
blueskyLogin.description: Connect your BlueSky account to sync your data and enjoy the full experience.

tooltip.info: We never store your password. We only use secure authentication tokens provided by BlueSky.
tooltip.noAccount: Don't have a BlueSky account yet?

consentModal.title: Upload Confirmation
consentModal.description: By uploading your Twitter files, you confirm that:

conditions.ownership: You are the legitimate owner of this data.
conditions.cnrsUsage: You agree that the provided data will be used by the National Center for Scientific Research (CNRS) as part of the HelloQuitteX operation.
conditions.profileCreation: You understand that this data will be used to create your profile on HelloQuitteX.

hosted.text: This platform is hosted by {cnrs} and developed in partnership with {hqx}

loginButtons.deleteAccount: I've already deleted my Twitter account

uploadButton.uploadInProgress: We are analyzing your archive, please wait ...
uploadButton.clickOrDrop: Click or drag your archive here

error.uploadFailed: Upload failed after several attempts. Please try again.

uploadResults.congratulations: Congratulations @{username}, you are registered for the journey!
uploadResults.importSuccess: Your file import has registered {count} new passengers!
uploadResults.inviteFriends: Invite your followers to join you!

signin.title: Ready to travel to new shores ?
signin.subtitle: Start by connecting with Twitter to migrate your data

migrationStep.completed: You have completed the first step of your migration
migrationStep.daysLeft: {count} days left before the big departure
migrationStep.nextSteps: Complete the following steps to sail to new shores!

shareModal.title: Share your journey
shareModal.shareText: ðŸ”¥The X exodus is massive! Don't lose any of your followers. Thanks to #HelloQuitX I've registered {count} new passengers for a journey to #BlueSky & #Mastodon. Join us and automatically find your communities on #January20!

newsletter.title: Stay Informed
newsletter.description: Sign up to follow the project's progress and be notified of new features.
newsletter.subscribed: You are subscribed to the newsletter!
newsletter.acceptHQX: I want to receive updates from HelloQuitteX

upload.title: Import your Twitter archive to continue your journey
upload.action: Drop or select your files here
upload.description:
Three data formats are accepted:
- your original X archive if <1GB (in Zip format)
- following.js and followers.js files TOGETHER and unzipped,
- split versions of these files for large archives (following-part*.js + followers-part*.js)
upload.loading: Your files are being processed, please stay on the page until redirection.
upload.helpButton: Help with getting your Twitter archive

helpModal.title: How to get your Twitter archive?
helpModal.description: To get your Twitter archive, follow these steps:
steps: Log in to your Twitter account
Go to "More" in the left menu
Click on "Settings and Support" then "Settings and Privacy"
In "Your Account", select "Download an archive of your data"
Twitter will send you an email when your archive is ready to download
Once downloaded, you can import the .zip file here
helpModal.note: Note: Twitter archive preparation can take up to 24 hours.

errors.fileType: Invalid file type. Please upload either a ZIP file or following.js and follower.js files
errors.invalidCombination: Please upload either a ZIP file, following.js + follower.js, or their split versions (following-part*.js/follower-part*.js)

profile.unlinkError: An error occurred while unlinking your {provider} account

errors.lastAccount: Cannot unlink your last connected account

deleteConfirm.message:
